```{r}
# load the objects
load("nba2017-salary-points.RData")
# list the available objects
ls()
```
```{r}
class(points)
class(salary)
class(team)
```
```{r}
# quick summary of statistics
summary(points)
summary(salary)
summary(team)
summary(experience)
summary(position)
summary(player)
```
```{r}
# statistics for salary
salary_mean <- mean(salary)
salary_mean
salary_sd <- sd(salary)
salary_sd
salary_min <- min(salary)
salary_min
salary_max <- max(salary)
salary_max
salary_median <- median(salary)
salary_median
```
```{r}
hist(salary)
boxplot(salary)
```
